title: Kylie Jenner swigs tequila straight from the bottle diromg wild night with Sofia Richie
text:
Kylie Jenner left one-year-old daughter Stormi at home while she stepped out for some fun with her friends on Saturday.

The 22-year-old hit the town with her three friends Sofia Richie, Will.I.Am, and J Balvin as they party the night away during Halloween weekend.

She wore a slimming black number as she took to her Instagram to share her eventful night while out with some of her famous friends.

Having fun: Kylie Jenner hit the town with pal Sofia Richie Saturday for a wild night out that included J Balvin's concert and a meet up with rapper Will.I.Am

Backstage! Sofia and Kylie took a swig of the good stuff as they prepped for the show while backstage

For the evening out, she wore a long-sleeve black leather button-up dress that had a high slit on the side.

She wore a pair of black tights and black high heel ankle boots to finish off the night time number.

Sofia kept it casual in a light colored turtleneck sweater and a black pair of high waisted pants as the two girls hung backstage at J Balvin's show.

Backstage fun! The two best friends appeared to have fun pre-gaming backstage as Will.I.Am joined in on the fun later on

Looking good: The besties smiled and pouted for social media

The two best friends appeared to have fun pre-gaming backstage as Will.I.Am joined in on the fun later on.

She also shared a short clip of the two walking hand-in-hand as they headed to the show.

After posting a few pics of her famous friend's set she quickly hurried backstage to try on a pair of sleek glasses that changed colors.

Showering looks: Kylie worked the camera as she posed in a shower while backstage at J Balvin's concert

Kylie and the influencer have been friends since they were younger, as Sofia is the daughter of Lionel Richie and ran in the same circle as Kylie's mother, Kris Jenner.

Growing up, they were spotted at concerts together and even sat next to one another at New York Fashion Week back in 2017, shortly before she started to date Scott Disick (Kylie's sister Kourtney Kardashian's ex-girlfriend.)

When the two started to date, it was as if the Kardashian klan grew quiet as Kourtney and Scott share their three kids together.

Trying it out: Kylie tried on the eccentric glasses that Will.I.Am was wearing to see if they went with her look of the night

But it seems as all is well with the family and the model as she also recently made her debut on their reality show, Keeping Up With the Kardashians.

But back in May during the Lord Disick's birthday party, Sofia and the Kardashians all joined together to make the evening special.

And in June Sofia was spotted at Kylie's house for the first time in awhile and have been inseparable since.

Good friends: Kylie and J Balvin pose backstage ahead of his big performance
description: Kylie Jenner is leaving her one-year-old daughter Stormi at home as she steps out for some fun with her friends. The 22-year-old hit the town with her three friends Sofia Richie, Will.I.Am, and J Balvin.
